    • Method Detail

      • add_party_button

        private void add_party_button(javax.swing.JPanel panel,
                    java.lang.String name,
                    ChooseType type,
                    IParty party,
                    java.awt.Color color)
        Add a button that represent a choice for an action in the choosing list panel.
        Parameters:
        panel - The panel to whom the button should be added.
        name - The text on the button.
        type - The button type (next, previous or party).
        party - The party (should be null if type!=party)
        color - The color for the button.

      • make_special_panel

        private void make_special_panel(javax.swing.JPanel special_panel,
                      IParty whiteNote)
        Add the three special button (previous, white note, next) to the given panel.
        Parameters:
        special_panel - The given panel.
        whiteNote - The IParty that represent "white note".

      • make_parties_panel

        Parameters:
        parties_panel -
        partiesToShow -

      • makeChoosingPanel

        private javax.swing.JPanel makeChoosingPanel(IPartiesList partiesToShow)
        Make The choosing panel (choosing window main panel). The panel include up to 9 buttons for party choosing, Buttons to move back and forward in the parties, and an option to choose white note (no party).
        Parameters:
        partiesToShow - as much as 9 parties we want to show.
        Returns:
        A panel that enable the user to choose all the options mention above.

      • setResult

        public void setResult(IParty choosen_party,
             ChooseType type)
        Inform the window on the chosen action.
        Parameters:
        choosen_party - The party that was chosen (if any).
        type - The action type (Party, Next or Previous).
